thread.section_title: Black Mango Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Black Mango | blackmango.com.au
thread.title: Judith ( Sydney)
thread.title_full: Black Mango reviewed by Judith ( Sydney)

author: Judith ( Sydney)
title: Judith ( Sydney)
text: Before buying this item ,I phoned in because I had a few questions. Lady on the phone was extremely helpful in helping me to make a decision. She even sent me some colour swatches. I had never bought such a large item online and was naturally concerned. Everything went smoothly . Item was delivered to my door within a few days. It was beautifully packed, and I was delighted with the appearance and the quality. Now my daughter wants a dressing bench for her room, so I will have no hesitation to order from them again.
